record.dc:title: 181GP22, 15GP22, Greenup County, Kentucky. Hardin Village. Dog Skeleton, Feature 139.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Fort Ancient Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Close-up of dog burial. Feature 139. Buried head upside down, front legs folded. Rear legs mostly removed by shovel.
record.wpa:comments: More information, including diagram, available at institution.
